## IParameterAssociatedActionNames interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

The configuration interface for associating a parameter definition with a Heft command line action in [IHeftRegisterParameterOptions](./heft.iheftregisterparameteroptions.md) .

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IParameterAssociatedActionNames 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [associatedActionNames](./heft.iparameterassociatedactionnames.associatedactionnames.md) | string\[\] | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> A string list of one or more action names to associate the parameter with. |
